pullrequest.title: Icons and smaller buttons for toolpalette widget

content.raw:
Is this ready for merging then?

The issue @shaunj has raised is unrelated to this pull request, is logged as an issue in the tracker, and is difficult to fix (although I think I've worked out how to do it...but I kinda want to just refactor all of the dragdroptab code because it is terrible)
